Documentation for the core program¶

class rampedpyrox.RealData(all_data, nT=250)[source]¶

Subclass for real data thermograms (i.e. actual dirt burner data).

plot(ax=None, xaxis='time')[source]¶

Plots the true thermogram and peaks against time or temp.

Kwargs:
ax (plt axis handle): Axis to plot on or None xaxis (str): Sets the x axis units: either ‘time’ or ‘temp’
Returns:ax – Updated axis with plotted data
Return type:plt axis handle
class rampedpyrox.ModeledData(t, Tau, g_hat, gp)[source]¶

Subclass for thermograms generated using an f(Ea) distribution.

plot(ax=None, xaxis='time')[source]¶

Plots the modeled thermogram and peaks against time or temp.

Kwargs:
ax (plt axis handle): Axis to plot on or None xaxis (str): Sets the x axis units: either ‘time’ or ‘temp’
Returns:ax – Updated axis with plotted data
Return type:plt axis handle
